basics.name: Nicolás Aldao
basics.label: Frontend Developer with 5 years of experience in IT
basics.summary: I had my first exposure to programming through video games. After studying English for a couple of years, I had the opportunity to start a Bachelor's Degree in System Analysis, which I completed in 2020. I began my professional journey at an Argentinean IT company, where I worked for 5 years. I am currently working on freelance projects for clients abroad.

work.name: React Native Developer (various projects)
work.position: Upwork, Freelance | Refers app project (USA) and fitness app project (Argentina)
work.summary: Bug fixing and new features development in mobile applications. Optimization and refactoring of legacy code. APK generation, testing on iOS and Android. Configuration and implementation of various React Native libraries. Styling with TailwindCSS.

work.name: React Developer
work.summary: Fix bugs and new features development in mobile application. Create responsive UI. Deploys with Jenkins. Refactor and optimize old code.
